name: Station 6
overview: On this disc: EXCLUSIVE PLAYABLE: Premier Manager '99 - "Take any Italian team and play up to 12 complete games, including Cup, League and Friendlies" Viva Football - "Exclusive 1 or 2 player demo. Take part in the greatest football match that never was: Pele's Brazil (1970) Vs Maradona's Argentina (1986)" Warzone 2100 - "Use the tutorial to perfect your skills, and then play two complete levels of Eidos' brand new strategy blockbuster" ALSO PLAYABLE: Rival Schools Motorhead Including Exclusive Rolling Demo of: Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver
